name: Save The Girls
description:
Welcome to a world full of fun and sex! ! Protect cute girls from danger! When you successfully protect them they will dedicate their bodies!
Come and find the girls' secret garden! Happiness is waiting for you ahead!Game introduction
A lightweight casual game that can be operated with a mouse. Pass 30 levels in the game, get stars, unlock different characters, and get in touch with them. A night of passion, enjoy unparalleled joy.Colorful stories
Every beautiful girl will have her own exclusive plot, some are warm, some are touching, some are tragic, everything is up to you. Don't worry about missing any plot direction, you can change different options at will according to the plot chapters.Game Features
Each beautiful girl has a complete Japanese dubbing.
6 characters dynamic CG
30 well-set levels
one handed mode
